name: cocktailer
0:
”Alexa, open cocktail instructor”
”How to make margarita”
”which cocktail I can make using vodka”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cocktail instructor
des: Cocktailer gives you instructions to prepare any cocktail depending on your choice. If you are confused and don't know what to make it can suggest you random cocktail names and how to make them. If you want to know about any specific cocktail you can ask for it by specifying its name and it can give you instructions to prepare that specific cocktail. Also you can ask which cocktail you can prepare from any particular ingredient you have. Once you get the name of cocktail that can be prepared from particular ingredient you can ask for instructions to make that cocktail.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
